document.full_text: yandex, russia's most popular internet search engine, plans to raise up to $1 billion in an initial public offering on nasdaq, it said on thursday.
document.title: russian search engine yandex seeks $1 billion nasdaq ipo
lines_and_colors: yandex, russia's most popular internet search engine, plans to raise up to $1 billion in an initial public offering on nasdaq, it said on thursday.
